work.name: Blue Owl
work.description: My job was mainly about creating custom WordPress themes. I improved development process with Docker (see my projects). I've rewritten Blue Owl website from scratch using Gatsby (blueowl.pl). I left Blue Owl because I wanted to work closer to my tech stack.

work.name: Codility
work.description: I'm creating recruitment task for aspiring software developers. I was able to create many tasks involving both frontend and backend JavaScript, CSS, HTML and Python. My job involves developing task ideas, solutions and tests. Docker is a crucial part of my work.
